ComicInfo.Summary: 'Falling Apart,' Part One: 'Damage' Touched by the notorious Negate, Dragon's powers are slowly diminishing. His immune system in chaos, Dragon faces his toughest opponent and the result is anything but pretty! Meanwhile, at home, Mister Glum prepares to make his move at long last!
ComicInfo.Title: Dread Knight Returns; The Reckoning
